PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PrecastSlab
PropertySetDef.Definition: Layout and component information defining how prestressed slab components are laid out in a precast slab assembly. The values are global defaults for the slab as a whole, but can be overridden by local placements of the individual com

PropertyDef.Name: TypeDesignator
PropertyDef.Definition: Type designator for the precast concrete slab, expressing mainly the component type. Possible values are “Hollow-core”, “Double-tee”, “Flat plank”, etc.

PropertyDef.Name: ToppingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines if a topping is applied and what kind. Values are “Full topping”, “Perimeter Wash”, “None”

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeDistanceToFirstAxis
PropertyDef.Definition: The distance from the left (‘West’) edge of the slab (in the direction of span of the components) to the axis of the first component.

PropertyDef.Name: DistanceBetweenComponentAxes
PropertyDef.Definition: The distance between the axes of the components, measured along the ‘South’ edge of the slab.

PropertyDef.Name: AngleToFirstAxis
PropertyDef.Definition: The angle of rotation of the axis of the first component relative to the ‘West’ edge of the slab.

PropertyDef.Name: AngleBetweenComponentAxes
PropertyDef.Definition: The angle between the axes of each pair of components.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal overall thickness of the slab.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalToppingThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal thickness of the topping.
